Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: PURPOSE : To compare the susceptibility to nephrotoxic effect of CM in patients undergoing PTRA with that of patients submitted to percutaneous coronary intervention ( PCI ) .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| Nephrotoxic effect of CM |
| Patients undergoing PTRA (Percutaneous Transluminal Angioplasty or Percutaneous Transluminal Angioplasty and Stenting) |
| Patients submitted to PCI (Percutaneous Coronary Intervention) |

Note: "Nephrotoxic effect of CM" refers to the harmful effect of contrast media on the kidneys.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Disease |
| --- |
| Nephrotoxic effect of CM |

Note: In the original paragraph, "patients undergoing PTRA" and "patients submitted to PCI" are not diseases, but rather groups of patients undergoing different medical procedures. Therefore, they should not be included in the table as diseases.
